trans-unit.source: Checklist Template

seg-source.mrk: Checklist Template

trans-unit.source: Information entered in the General and Calculation FastTabs on this page are valid for all checklist lines.

seg-source.mrk: Information entered in the General and Calculation FastTabs on this page are valid for all checklist lines.

trans-unit.source: : Checklist Template

seg-source.mrk: : Checklist Template

trans-unit.source: General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: General FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Code

seg-source.mrk: Code

trans-unit.source: This field is the identification of the checklist. The code must be unique and can contain up to 20 characters.

seg-source.mrk: This field is the identification of the checklist.
The code must be unique and can contain up to 20 characters.

trans-unit.source: Description and Description 2

seg-source.mrk: Description and Description 2

trans-unit.source: Description of the checklist, each allows a maximum of 50 characters.

seg-source.mrk: Description of the checklist, each allows a maximum of 50 characters.

trans-unit.source: Checklist Type

seg-source.mrk: Checklist Type

trans-unit.source: Classifies the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: Classifies the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Automatic Recalculation

seg-source.mrk: Automatic Recalculation

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the formulas inserted in the checklist lines (that are set up for automatic recalculation) are automatically recalculated after an entry is made.

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether the formulas inserted in the checklist lines (that are set up for automatic recalculation) are automatically recalculated after an entry is made.

trans-unit.source: If this check box is not selected, all lines need to be manually calculated, regardless of the automatic recalculation setting on the line.

seg-source.mrk: If this check box is not selected, all lines need to be manually calculated, regardless of the automatic recalculation setting on the line.

trans-unit.source: Show Sub-Checklists

seg-source.mrk: Show Sub-Checklists

trans-unit.source: If selected, sub-checklists will appear below the related checklist lines in the Checklist document. If not selected, sub-checklists can be accessed manually on the Checklist document (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Sub Checklists.htm#_Ref369439830" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Sub-Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: If selected, sub-checklists will appear below the related checklist lines in the Checklist document.

If not selected, sub-checklists can be accessed manually on the Checklist document (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Sub Checklists.htm#_Ref369439830" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Sub-Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Open Immediately

seg-source.mrk: Open Immediately

trans-unit.source: If selected, and the checklist template is copied to a Sales Quote/Order and/or a Purchase Quote/Order line, the copied Checklist document will open automatically after the Quantity has been entered.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, and the checklist template is copied to a Sales Quote/Order and/or a Purchase Quote/Order line, the copied Checklist document will open automatically after the Quantity has been entered.

trans-unit.source: Language

seg-source.mrk: Language

trans-unit.source: Default language of the checklist template or the translated language that is available for the template if the “Find/Create Translation” function is run; used with checklist translations (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766061" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Default language of the checklist template or the translated language that is available for the template if the “Find/Create Translation” function is run; used with checklist translations (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766061" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Status

seg-source.mrk: Status

trans-unit.source: Indicates the status of the checklist. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the status of the checklist.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: New – This is the default status when a Checklist Template is created. In this status, the Checklist Template can be edited.

seg-source.mrk: New – This is the default status when a Checklist Template is created.
In this status, the Checklist Template can be edited.

trans-unit.source: Certified – With this status, the checklist can be used in sales and purchase documents and construction orders. In this status, a Checklist Template cannot be edited. If an uncertified checklist is copied to a document, a message appears.

seg-source.mrk: Certified – With this status, the checklist can be used in sales and purchase documents and construction orders.
In this status, a Checklist Template cannot be edited.
If an uncertified checklist is copied to a document, a message appears.

trans-unit.source: Under Development – This status indicates that a Checklist Template is being worked on. After the changes are made, the Status must be set to Certified.

seg-source.mrk: Under Development – This status indicates that a Checklist Template is being worked on.
After the changes are made, the Status must be set to Certified.

trans-unit.source: Closed – This status indicates that this checklist template is no longer in use.

seg-source.mrk: Closed – This status indicates that this checklist template is no longer in use.

trans-unit.source: Version Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Version Nos.

trans-unit.source: Reference to the number series for checklist versions.

seg-source.mrk: Reference to the number series for checklist versions.

trans-unit.source: Last Status Modified Date

seg-source.mrk: Last Status Modified Date

trans-unit.source: Date of the last status change of the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: Date of the last status change of the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Last Status Modified User ID

seg-source.mrk: Last Status Modified User ID

trans-unit.source: User ID of the last person who changed the status on the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: User ID of the last person who changed the status on the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Last Date Modified

seg-source.mrk: Last Date Modified

trans-unit.source: Date of the last change to the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: Date of the last change to the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Modified User ID

seg-source.mrk: Modified User ID

trans-unit.source: User ID of the last person who changed the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: User ID of the last person who changed the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Act. Version No.

seg-source.mrk: Act.
Version No.

trans-unit.source: Number of the current checklist version.

seg-source.mrk: Number of the current checklist version.

trans-unit.source: Lines FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Lines FastTab

trans-unit.source: The checklist lines can be entered either manually or from pre-defined checklist questions/answers. If using the pre-defined checklist questions, all fields from the question and answer mappings are copied into the checklist lines and can be changed.

seg-source.mrk: The checklist lines can be entered either manually or from pre-defined checklist questions/answers.
If using the pre-defined checklist questions, all fields from the question and answer mappings are copied into the checklist lines and can be changed.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Type

seg-source.mrk: Type

trans-unit.source: The following line type options are available:

seg-source.mrk: The following line type options are available:

trans-unit.source: Question – Indicates that the line is a question. In the No. field, a valid pre-defined question can be selected.

seg-source.mrk: Question – Indicates that the line is a question.
In the No.
field, a valid pre-defined question can be selected.

trans-unit.source: Answer – Indicates that the line is an answer.

seg-source.mrk: Answer – Indicates that the line is an answer.

trans-unit.source: Answers are assigned to the question above it. If the More Answers Possible check box is not selected for the question, only one answer for each question can be selected.

seg-source.mrk: Answers are assigned to the question above it.
If the More Answers Possible check box is not selected for the question, only one answer for each question can be selected.

trans-unit.source: With this type, no further dependence between question and answer exists.

seg-source.mrk: With this type, no further dependence between question and answer exists.

trans-unit.source: Headline – Lines that are inserted for clarity as headings.

seg-source.mrk: Headline – Lines that are inserted for clarity as headings.

trans-unit.source: Selection Option – Selection options are assigned to a question and normally do not have their own variables. The value of a selection option is entered in the Input field of the question (refer to topic “Variable/Attribute Types” on page 1 for additional information about using this checklist answer type).

seg-source.mrk: Selection Option – Selection options are assigned to a question and normally do not have their own variables.
The value of a selection option is entered in the Input field of the question (refer to topic “Variable/Attribute Types” on page 1 for additional information about using this checklist answer type).

trans-unit.source: Level

seg-source.mrk: Level

trans-unit.source: Provides the basis of a question/answer hierarchy.

seg-source.mrk: Provides the basis of a question/answer hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: When Type = Selection Option, the options must always be one level deeper than the associated question.

seg-source.mrk: When Type = Selection Option, the options must always be one level deeper than the associated question.

trans-unit.source: No.

seg-source.mrk: No.

trans-unit.source: Selecting a number is only possible with questions and answers. The number corresponds to the Code field on the checklist questions and answers.

seg-source.mrk: Selecting a number is only possible with questions and answers.
The number corresponds to the Code field on the checklist questions and answers.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Contains the description of the line. The description depends on the selection in the Type field:

seg-source.mrk: Contains the description of the line.
The description depends on the selection in the Type field:

trans-unit.source: If a value is entered into the No. field, then the Description field is automatically populated with the corresponding description.

seg-source.mrk: If a value is entered into the No.
field, then the Description field is automatically populated with the corresponding description.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the field is blank and needs to be filled in with the proper question or answer to appear on the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: Otherwise, the field is blank and needs to be filled in with the proper question or answer to appear on the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Translation Code

seg-source.mrk: Translation Code

trans-unit.source: Contains the translation code generated from the “Find/Create Translation” function. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766073" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the translation code generated from the “Find/Create Translation” function.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766073" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Description (T)

seg-source.mrk: Description (T)

trans-unit.source: Contains the translated description if translations are used. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766068" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the translated description if translations are used.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Checklist Translations.htm#_Ref406766068" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Checklist Translations” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Value for Input

seg-source.mrk: Value for Input

trans-unit.source: This field is only relevant with a Type of Selection Option.

seg-source.mrk: This field is only relevant with a Type of Selection Option.

trans-unit.source: Here a value can be assigned to a selection option. With this value the further calculation is then accomplished in the checklist. For example, the question about a color can be assigned the answer (the color blue = value 1).

seg-source.mrk: Here a value can be assigned to a selection option.
With this value the further calculation is then accomplished in the checklist.
For example, the question about a color can be assigned the answer (the color blue = value 1).

trans-unit.source: The assigned value appears in the Input field on the checklist question line. If no value is assigned, the description of the answer in the Input field is given.

seg-source.mrk: The assigned value appears in the Input field on the checklist question line.
If no value is assigned, the description of the answer in the Input field is given.

trans-unit.source: More Answers Possible

seg-source.mrk: More Answers Possible

trans-unit.source: If selected, several answers are possible for the question, but only if the Type field on the answer is set to Selection Option.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, several answers are possible for the question, but only if the Type field on the answer is set to Selection Option.

trans-unit.source: Input Type

seg-source.mrk: Input Type

trans-unit.source: Definition of the data type that is expected of an answer. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Definition of the data type that is expected of an answer.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Text

seg-source.mrk: Text

trans-unit.source: Time

seg-source.mrk: Time

trans-unit.source: Decimal

seg-source.mrk: Decimal

trans-unit.source: Boolean

seg-source.mrk: Boolean

trans-unit.source: Date

seg-source.mrk: Date

trans-unit.source: Integer

seg-source.mrk: Integer

trans-unit.source: Selected

seg-source.mrk: Selected

trans-unit.source: Default value for an answer. This field is only valid when the Type field is set to Answer and the Input Type field is set to Boolean.

seg-source.mrk: Default value for an answer.
This field is only valid when the Type field is set to Answer and the Input Type field is set to Boolean.

trans-unit.source: Input Description

seg-source.mrk: Input Description

trans-unit.source: Additional description of the answer with a maximum of 80 characters.

seg-source.mrk: Additional description of the answer with a maximum of 80 characters.

trans-unit.source: Input

seg-source.mrk: Input

trans-unit.source: Input field for answers and questions. This field refers to the input type. The Input Type field determines which inputs are permitted. With the Input Type of Boolean, a “Y” or “Yes” or “N” or “No” must be entered in the Input field. The Selected check box is then activated if “Y” or “Yes” is entered.

seg-source.mrk: Input field for answers and questions.
This field refers to the input type.
The Input Type field determines which inputs are permitted.
With the Input Type of Boolean, a “Y” or “Yes” or “N” or “No” must be entered in the Input field.
The Selected check box is then activated if “Y” or “Yes” is entered.

trans-unit.source: When a question has answers that have the Type field set to Selection Option, use the arrow in the Input field to select from the different selection options.

seg-source.mrk: When a question has answers that have the Type field set to Selection Option, use the arrow in the Input field to select from the different selection options.

trans-unit.source: Low/Upper Limit

seg-source.mrk: Low/Upper Limit

trans-unit.source: In these fields, assign a range of values to an answer.

seg-source.mrk: In these fields, assign a range of values to an answer.

trans-unit.source: Rounding Precision

seg-source.mrk: Rounding Precision

trans-unit.source: In this field, the exact rounding of the input number can be determined.

seg-source.mrk: In this field, the exact rounding of the input number can be determined.

trans-unit.source: Description Bold

seg-source.mrk: Description Bold

trans-unit.source: Select this check box to have the text in the Description field bolded on the checklist.

seg-source.mrk: Select this check box to have the text in the Description field bolded on the checklist.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This field has no style influence when Description Color = yellow (never bolded) or green (always bolded).

seg-source.mrk: This field has no style influence when Description Color = yellow (never bolded) or green (always bolded).

trans-unit.source: Description Color

seg-source.mrk: Description Color

trans-unit.source: In this field, the color of the text in the Description field is specified. The options are black, blue, red [italicized], green [bolded] and yellow.

seg-source.mrk: In this field, the color of the text in the Description field is specified.
The options are black, blue, red [italicized], green [bolded] and yellow.

trans-unit.source: Mandatory Input

seg-source.mrk: Mandatory Input

trans-unit.source: If selected, then the Input field must be filled in on this line.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, then the Input field must be filled in on this line.

trans-unit.source: Comment

seg-source.mrk: Comment

trans-unit.source: Additional remarks can be entered in this field. With questions, the remark is replaced with the master data.

seg-source.mrk: Additional remarks can be entered in this field.
With questions, the remark is replaced with the master data.

trans-unit.source: Component Type

seg-source.mrk: Component Type

trans-unit.source: Here you can specify a component type. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Here you can specify a component type.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: <blank>

seg-source.mrk: <blank>

trans-unit.source: Resource

seg-source.mrk: Resource

seg-source.mrk: Account (G/L)

trans-unit.source: Work Center

seg-source.mrk: Work Center

trans-unit.source: Item

seg-source.mrk: Item

trans-unit.source: Machine Center

seg-source.mrk: Machine Center

trans-unit.source: When a component type is used, the related G/L account, item, resource, work or machine center can be selected in the Input field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: When a component type is used, the related G/L account, item, resource, work or machine center can be selected in the Input field on the line.

trans-unit.source: Item Category Code

seg-source.mrk: Item Category Code

trans-unit.source: This field is considered on a checklist template line that has the Type field set to Answer and the Component Type field set to Item.

seg-source.mrk: This field is considered on a checklist template line that has the Type field set to Answer and the Component Type field set to Item.

trans-unit.source: Use the arrow in the Input field on this answer line to see and select from the items that belong to this item category.

seg-source.mrk: Use the arrow in the Input field on this answer line to see and select from the items that belong to this item category.

trans-unit.source: Sub-Checklist Template Code

seg-source.mrk: Sub-Checklist Template Code

trans-unit.source: If necessary, alternative checklists can be assigned to a checklist line. In this field, the code of the sub-checklist is entered (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Sub Checklists.htm#_Ref369439841" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Sub-Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: If necessary, alternative checklists can be assigned to a checklist line.

In this field, the code of the sub-checklist is entered (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Example Sub Checklists.htm#_Ref369439841" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Example – Sub-Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Text Set ID

trans-unit.source: Indicates the ID of any text from the cc|text module that has been entered for the checklist line (refer to topic “Example – Line Text on the Checklist” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Checklist Line Pictures

seg-source.mrk: Checklist Line Pictures

trans-unit.source: Similar to the Checklist Questions and Answers, a picture can be assigned directly to a Checklist Line Template and Checklist Line Version and then displayed in the Checklist Picture FactBox and in the Picture field on the checklist line. The picture will also be displayed for the document-related checklist line.

seg-source.mrk: Similar to the Checklist Questions and Answers, a picture can be assigned directly to a Checklist Line Template and Checklist Line Version and then displayed in the Checklist Picture FactBox and in the Picture field on the checklist line.
The picture will also be displayed for the document-related checklist line.

trans-unit.source: To assign a picture to a checklist line, select the line and then click Checklist > Picture on the Lines FastTab. In the Checklist Picture page, right-click the Picture box and then click Select Picture.

seg-source.mrk: To assign a picture to a checklist line, select the line and then click Checklist > Picture on the Lines FastTab.
In the Checklist Picture page, right-click the Picture box and then click Select Picture.

trans-unit.source: : Selecting picture on checklist line

seg-source.mrk: : Selecting picture on checklist line

trans-unit.source: Locate and select the picture file to import and then click Open.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and select the picture file to import and then click Open.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Checklist Picture page. The picture appears in the Checklist Picture FactBox and the Picture field on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Checklist Picture page.
The picture appears in the Checklist Picture FactBox and the Picture field on the line.

trans-unit.source: : Checklist line and FactBox with picture

seg-source.mrk: : Checklist line and FactBox with picture

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: As with other FactBoxes, the Checklist Picture FactBox can be hidden. The picture can also be previewed by right-clicking the image in the Picture field on the checklist line and selecting Preview Picture.

seg-source.mrk: As with other FactBoxes, the Checklist Picture FactBox can be hidden.
The picture can also be previewed by right-clicking the image in the Picture field on the checklist line and selecting Preview Picture.

trans-unit.source: Calculation FastTab
